attributes.action: restrict the powers of the office of Mayor of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Mayor of London has now embedded a track record of total contempt for democracy. Whether his imposisiton of policies are right or wrong, it is not right for one individual surrounded by advisors and secrecy to be operating in such a way.
Until suchtime the GLA is allowed a proper and fair way to regulate the Mayor, Powers of office should be restricted and not increased.
